meanings.definition: A small moth of the family Tortricidae.
meanings.sent1: The tortricid fluttered gracefully around the garden.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a tortricid resting on a leaf in the park.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous tortricid played hide-and-seek with the other insects.
meanings.sent4: Like a tiny dancer, the tortricid twirled in the air.
meanings.sent5: The colorful tortricid added beauty to the natural surroundings.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the family Tortricidae.
meanings.sent1: The tortricid caterpillar had unique markings on its body.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the tortricid species to learn more about their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The tortricid party in the garden was full of excitement and laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as elegant as a tortricid wing.
meanings.sent5: The tortricid aroma filled the air with a sweet fragrance.
